    Read user from ELO.

  • Method Details

    • tryReadEloUser

      UserInfo tryReadEloUser​(java.lang.String userName, boolean mustExist) throws byps.RemoteException
      Read user from ELO. If user is not found and mustExist=false, return a new UserInfo object with UserInfo.id=-1 and UserInfo.name=userName.
      Parameters:
      userName -
      mustExist - if true, an exception is thrown if the user does not exist.
      Returns:
      UserInfo object.
      Throws:
      byps.RemoteException

    • getInitialContextEnvironment

      void getInitialContextEnvironment​(Domain domain, java.lang.String ldapUrl, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> environment)
      Get environment properties to create an javax.naming.directory.InitialDirContext.
      Parameters:
      domain - Domain
      ldapUrl - Server url
      userName - User name to authenticate
      password - User password
      environment - The properties built by the other parameters have to be added to this map.

    • createInitialDirContext

      javax.naming.directory.InitialDirContext createInitialDirContext​(Domain domain, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> environment) throws java.lang.Exception
      Create an javax.naming.directory.InitialDirContext.
      Parameters:
      domain - Domain
      environment - Environment properties, created by getInitialContextEnvironment(Domain, String, String, String, Map).
      Returns:
      InitialDirContext object.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • closeContext

      void closeContext​(javax.naming.Context ctxt)
      Close Context object.
      Parameters:
      ctxt - Context object.

    • searchPerson

      javax.naming.NamingEnumeration<javax.naming.directory.SearchResult> searchPerson​(javax.naming.directory.DirContext ctx, Domain domain, java.lang.String personSearchDN, java.lang.String filterPerson, java.lang.String userName, int timeoutSeconds, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> attributeNames) throws java.lang.Exception
      Search person by name or mail.
      Parameters:
      ctx - DirContext
      domain - Domain
      personSearchDN - Sub-trees to be searched (Distinguished Name).
      filterPerson - Filter expression.
      userName - User name.
      timeoutSeconds - Timeout value.
      attributeNames - Attributes to return.
      Returns:
      Attributes.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

      void getUserAttributeNames​(Domain domain, java.lang.String userDN, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> attributeNames)
      Get user attributes to be read.
      Parameters:
      domain - Domain
      userDN - User Distinguished name of user.
      attributeNames - Attribute names.

      Parameters:

      attributeNames - Attribute names.
      Returns:
      Attributes

    • getGroupDNsFromAttributes

      void getGroupDNsFromAttributes​(Domain domain, java.lang.String userDN, javax.naming.directory.Attributes attributes, java.lang.String attributeName, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> groupNames) throws java.lang.Exception
      Extract the Distinguished Names of groups found in the given attributes.
      Parameters:
      domain - Domain
      userDN - Distinguished name of user.
      attributes - Attributes
      attributeName - Attribute name of group membership
      groupNames - Distinguished Names of groups.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • extractGroupNameFromDN

      java.lang.String extractGroupNameFromDN​(Domain domain, java.lang.String groupDN)
      Extract group name from Distinguished Name.
      Parameters:
      domain - Domain
      groupDN - Group Distinguished Name
      Returns:
      Simple group name.

    • searchGroupsOfMember

      javax.naming.NamingEnumeration<javax.naming.directory.SearchResult> searchGroupsOfMember​(javax.naming.directory.DirContext ctxt, Domain domain, java.lang.String groupSearchDN, java.lang.String filterGroups, java.lang.String memberDN, int timeoutSeconds) throws java.lang.Exception
      Search groups in sub-tree of groupSearchDN that include memberDN as member.
      Parameters:
      ctxt - DirContext
      domain - Domain
      groupSearchDN - Distinguished Name of sub-tree
      filterGroups - Filter expression
      memberDN - Distinguished Name of group member.
      timeoutSeconds - Search timeout in seconds
      Returns:
      Enumeration
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • assignGroups

      void assignGroups​(UserInfo ui, Domain domain, java.lang.String userName, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> groupNamesOS) throws java.lang.Exception
      Assign the given groups to UserInfo.groupList. The default implementation calls checkoutUsers to read the ELO groups and maps the group names to their IDs. Group UserInfo.ID_EVERYONE should be always assigned.
      Parameters:
      ui - UserInfo.groupList is set by this function.
      domain - Domain
      userName - User name.
      groupNamesOS - Set of group names.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • assignUserName

      void assignUserName​(UserInfo ui, Domain domain, java.lang.String userName, javax.naming.directory.Attributes attributes) throws java.lang.Exception
      Assign user name, os name and mail address.
      Parameters:
      ui - UserInfo.name, UserInfo.userProps[UserInfoC.PROP_NAME_OS], and UserInfo.userProps[UserInfoC.PROP_NAME_EMAIL] are set.
      domain - Domain
      userName - User name.
      attributes - Attributes from LDAP server
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • assignSuperior

      void assignSuperior​(UserInfo ui, Domain domain, java.lang.String userName, javax.naming.directory.Attributes attributes) throws java.lang.Exception
      Assign superior.
      Parameters:
      ui - UserInfo.name, UserInfo.userProps[UserInfoC.PROP_NAME_OS], and UserInfo.userProps[UserInfoC.PROP_NAME_EMAIL] are set.
      domain - Domain
      userName - User name.
      attributes - Attributes from LDAP server
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception

    • assignProperties

      void assignProperties​(UserInfo ui, Domain domain, java.lang.String userName, javax.naming.directory.Attributes attributes) throws java.lang.Exception
      Assign LDAP attributes.
      Parameters:
      ui - UserInfo.ldapProperties are set
      domain - Domain
      userName - User name.
      attributes - Attributes from LDAP server
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception
